title: Does Cubase Pro 10 run better on Mac or Windows? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am on plenty of Facebook Cubase users groups. I must admit that most of the software related problems is coming from Windows users. I use Macs for many years and my Cubase is stable as a rock on both of my computers (over 8 years old MacPro tower and newer MacBook Pro). Theoretically Cubase should be stable on both systems but it seems Windows users have more problems.
